author: Napa California
name: Napa Podcast
description: Discover everything Napa, California has to offer with our podcast! From local events and current happenings to in-depth discussions on Napa’s rich culture, history, and community. We’ll also dive into newsletters, book recommendations, and all the insider tips you need to experience Napa like a true local. Whether you’re a visitor or a lifelong resident, there’s always more to explore in wine country!
